name: My House Is Haunted
description:
“My House is Haunted” is a five player horror game in which one of the players will act as a ghost and the four players will investigate what type of ghost it will be and protect the whole family. A family of npc who is the owner of the house, asked a group of Exorcists to identify and eliminate the ghost. The ghost will have to kill all the npcs to win.

"My House is Haunted” is created for a group of friends, streamers, or an individual who enjoys the thrill of identifying the ghost. As a creator I hope that Vtubers would collaborate and enjoy playing this game.

  • Play as Exorcist: Select a class in which role you want to play. On Exorcist side you can play as Paladin, Priest, Cardinal, Bishop.
  • Play as a Ghost: There are four type of ghost. You can select White Lady, Nanggal, Headless Priest, Oni.
  • Multiplayer: Play alongside your friends with up to 5 players in this co-op/pvp horror where your role play a huge part of your victory.
  • Investigate: If a family member dies, it will leave a clue on how to deal with the ghost and what type of ghost you will be fighting. (Future Update)
  • Voice Chat: Use your Mic for Proximity voice chat, but be careful because the ghost could be listening too. (Future Update)
  • Strategy: As a ghost, plan a different way to kill the individual member of the family or player.
